Review.Titre: Make sure this is exactly what you want before you order. 20% restocking fee!!
Review.Contenu: I ordered a $3600 floor scrubber online which was a big risk and my fault for making that decision.  I assumed, since this product was being ordered online, that there had to be some sort of reasonable return policy as I could not see it in person or try it out.  Unfortunately, the instant I opened the box I realized I needed the battery powered version instead of the plug version.  I contacted Cleanfreaks.com and they were helpful but informed me that not only would I have to pay to ship it back, I would be charged a 20% restocking fee.  This information is on their website so I admit that they didn't really do anything shady.  That being said,  I also discovered it would cost me $500-600 to ship it back.  Just to be clear, I never used the product or took it out of the box.  I found myself standing over the box, staring at this floor scrubber that I knew was not what I wanted.  Nevertheless I had just paid $1300 to discover this.I guess I would just say the only person who should be ordering a floor scrubber or any other cleaning machine through cleanfreaks.com is someone who has already used the product and knows exactly what they want.  But make sure you don't screw up the order or you'll be out about $1300 before you even open the box and discover the mistake you've made.  Why wouldn't you go to a local cleaning supply store and ask them to order it for you?  They might still charge you a restocking fee if you end up not liking it.   But they might have a rental you could try out at home before you take the dive on such an expensive product.  They also might have a used version you could try (presumably someone who sold them back the product they didn't want at the cost of a restocking fee).   At the very least you'll save yourself $500 in shipping even if you have to pay a restocking fee.  By the way, I have since checked with a few local stores and the price they are quoting me is about what Cleanfreaks.com sold it to me for minus the $500 shipping fee.  Don't expect to get a better deal online for this.  It just doesn't make sense to buy a product like this from Cleanfreaks.com or or any other online vendor for that matter.

It would have been nice to get an update on my back order item, I had to call each time to get an update and was spoke to very rudely each time.

Review.Titre: Dissapointed
Review.Contenu: I ordered a clean freak extractor on 3/16/2020. It came in about a week later & I was immediately disappointed in its quality. However, I told myself to give it an honest try...after using it a few times...I had multiple struggles with it. The sprayer tip had to be removed on day1 and readjusted...still not quite right but better than how the factory sent it out. The latch to secure the tanks together is just a poor pitiful design. The stainless tool is very bulky & uncomfortable to use compared to my previous Mytee Lite extractor. The suction/cleaning power just isn't adequate for me. So, in the past week I have called, left messages & sent an email attempting to return this item. NO RESPONSES BACK.....i cant fathom why a company of this size is operated so poorly. Customer service goes a long way & unfortunately this has been bad on both ends...Product&Service. The ONLY good thing about this whole experience, is the sweet young lady who helped me place my order via phone...she was very polite & accommodating. Order#: 500049498

Review.Titre: I was told the product was in stock and…
Review.Contenu: I was told the product was in stock and then a week later I was told they couldnt get any stock. So I am not impressed!

Review.Titre: I ordered a $1500 carpet extractor…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a $1500 carpet extractor online on 9/4/2018. My order confirmation email indicated that the shipment would drop ship possibly taking 7-12 days to arrive. On 9/13/2018, I called CleanFreak to inquire about the status of that order. Speaking with customer service rep Matt (who was very polite), I found that our order would not ship until around 10/7/2018 (more than a month after order/payment) - because the manufacturer, Viper, was building the extractor AFTER order/payment and was waiting on parts. Our order will drop directly from Viper in Michigan once our unit has been built. I kindly let Matt know that better customer service would involve communicating with us (rather than me having to call him) to let us know that the promised terms of delivery weren't even remotely accurate. He apologized. But ... I've been in management ... and I know the problem is not Matt's but CleanFreak's. This ain't customer service folks. Sitting on our money for over a month with no communications and no order delivery. Very disappointed.

Review.Titre: If your item is back ordered, good luck.
Review.Contenu: 5 weeks after my order and my item is still not here, and will not be here for at least three more weeks. I called them at the three week point and was told “that item is back ordered, and someone was supposed to reach out to you, but they didn’t.” It wasn’t until yesterday that I finally got the email stating the product was back ordered and they passed the buck onto their manufacturer. Super classy.No mention of stock status is anywhere on the website. Seems to me that in-stock status has been a part of most retail sites for a very long time. Had I known this particular item would be back ordered I wouldn’t have completed the order in the first place.Their phone agents are at least pleasant, but not service oriented. There was no apology, and no offer of further discounting or any other means of customer retention in the face of a severe delay that could have easily been solved with a few lines of code on the site, and/or an employee contact shortly after the order was placed.I had one previous order with them which was hassle free, but after this order they’ve lost me forever.

Review.Titre: Communication is key to good customer service.
Review.Contenu: Communication is key to good customer service. I was first told 7-10 business days for shipping on my item. My $700+ item, by the way. After 15 business days, they said it would ship on 10/11, which is a Sunday. I inquired and then was told it would ship the week of 10/11, but rest assured I would get tracking numbers for my my item, which shipped in three separate boxes due to its size and weight. Out of the blue, I received a box. It was one of the three, but only one. I never received any emails or contact letting me know my order had shipped. I asked again, could they provide the tracking numbers for me? And they sent me the tracking number of the items I had already gotten. I can’t imagine this is difficult, (because it’s not) just to send along information once you know something is on a way to a customer who had just spent almost $1,000 in your site.. but it was. I sent a strongly worded email and suddenly I was provided with the other two tracking numbers. I’m still waiting for my items. I will never order from Clean Freak again. I hope my items work, because if ordering is this hard I can’t fathom how hard a return or exchange would be!

Review.Titre: Call before you order
Review.Contenu: As a first time purchaser. I think the website should notify you to call before you place your order. I had to call customer service twice to get my order shipped out. The first time I was told that my autoscrubber comes directly from the manufacturer with the pad driver that I ordered. I told the rep that my tracking details only showed the pad driver arriving. I was reassured that they come together and not to worry. When I received my package it was just the pad driver as the shipping details showed. I called customer service a second time and spoke to a different rep who looked into it. I was told I would be called back once they figure it out and that in the future I should call before placing an order to make sure nothing is back ordered. An hour after speaking to the rep I receive an email with shipping details for the auto scrubber with no estimated shipping date. I had to wait for the shipping company to call and schedule the delivery to figure out when I would receive my order. Also, orders can be shipped between 5-12 business days. Meaning it can take 3 weeks to ship and then another week to receive your package. Moral of the story? Call before you place an order every time!

Review.Contenu: Shipping costs are too high.I bought a walk behind floor scrubber package. Also, the 17 inch floor buffer package. Their package deals are ok compared to others companies. However, the cost to ship their products to you is outrageous.  I ordered a Viper Shovel nose from another company and the cost was a lot less. $75 versus $180 or $213. If they get the Shipping cost down. They would get a 5 star. So far no issue with my purchase but it's only been a couple months.

Review.Titre: Delivery date not clear
Review.Contenu: Delivery date not clear, vacuum was free shipping but was charged for shipping vacuum bags ordered on same order - Why not ship those together and have no charge for shipping?  When I called in for assistance on ETA for delivery, the gentleman on the phone was not particularly warm or customer service oriented.  Not saying that I wouldn’t order from you again, but I am saying that I was not necessarily impressed with the buying experience

Review.Titre: I called on friday 10/18 to purchase a…
Review.Contenu: I called on friday 10/18 to purchase a couple of machines, the guy on the other line seemed annoyed with his life to assist me with some questions and concerns. Though i was confused about exactly a machine i needed he didn't seem to want to help and i just felt stupid asking him anything. I will look for better customer service elsewhere from a vendor who is excited to take my money.

Review.Titre: I ordered two products got one
Review.Contenu: I ordered two products got one tracking number and assumed both items were shipping together. I found out the second never shipped when I revived the 1st. I called they asked for contact info and some time to figure it out; got back to me within an hour and they have since send out the missing item. Also the One item I did revive was broken on arrival but that seems to be manufacture problem not that of CleanFreak.com

Review.Titre: I had to call three times to get my…
Review.Contenu: I had to call three times to get my password set up for an account so I could place an order. I don't understand why I couldn't have  the order placed over the phone to save some time instead of waiting 10- 15 min each time waiting on an email to setup an account to order, especially when I had 10 other orders to place with other vendors. My complaint time sensitive.

Review.Titre: For my first order I wanted to speak…
Review.Contenu: For my first order I wanted to speak with a representative. Call it old school but I like to know who I’m spending money with.  For future purchases I would have used the online order form.  However the representative seemed irritated that I called rather than using the online option. In fact I had to explain myself why I wasn’t ordering online, which he wasn’t any less frustratied

Review.Titre: I spoke with their customer service…
Review.Contenu: I spoke with their customer service representative to place my order and asked if I could receive my order in 3 days. She told me yes but it didn't happen. I had to drive to Fort Atkinson to pick-up my order after spending $110 on shipping. If I had known, I would have driven to Appleton to pick it up and saved myself the shipping charge. Doubt I will shop with them again unless I am desperate.Julie's Carpet Cleaning LLC.

Review.Titre: Full Payment Received for a Partial Order!
Review.Contenu: I recently discovered the CleanFreak corporation and placed a order, which was partially delivered. I currently have left a message and haven’t received any feedback.There is no indication that the remaining items were shipped separately, and I’m in limbo at this point. My plans to do the job was foiled. I’ll have to see what happens with this organization moving forward. Hopefully there will be some type of reasonable explanation for what happened to my remaining order.

Review.Titre: Unhappy with communications, delivery timeframe.
Review.Contenu: I ordered a replacement hose for a carpet extractor that I purchased from you a number of years ago.  I ordered the hose on the 19th.  It is the 27th and I just learned that the hose was not in stock and it is coming from the manufacturer.  I am now being promised a 7-12 day delivery.  Keep in mind, that Clean Freak's confirmation e-mail states that if a delay is going to occur, a customer support specialist will contact the customer.  I received no such contact.

Review.Titre: Unsure how to rate yet
Review.Contenu: Not sure how to rate yet. Yesterday when ordering, I was told they had 36 in stock and would be shipped yesterday, and 3-4 days for delivery. As of now, I have no verification that it has shipped. But later yesterday got an email stating it could take much longer. If told that, I would never have ordered from them.

Review.Titre: Product ordered was fabulous
Review.Contenu: Product ordered was fabulous, perfect fit to my machine. Website was not good to work with. Wouldn't recognize my shipping address no matter how many times I tried to get it in. So I left item in cart, called cust svc, they took order but also had difficulty with shipping address, related problems. Then I started getting item left in cart notices, nobody bothered to clear it when they took order on phone. Somebody needs to fix address lines in software. I've been in this house 4 yrs, should not be rejected.

Review.Titre: Ordered our machine first of March and…
Review.Contenu: Ordered our machine first of March and haven’t received it yet. Was tol 7-10 business days. I’m in the customer service business and understand back orders. The problem I have is that no one ever contacted me to let me know the progress of my order, I had to initiate the call each time

Review.Titre: Ordered 3 fans
Review.Contenu: Ordered 3 fans , got 2 right away. Third took three weeks to get and had to make multiple calls to find out where it was. Would have been better if the would have called ME to let me know there was a delay an how long it was going to take.

Review.Titre: Love the Shatter'd 99 product
Review.Contenu: Love the Shatter'd 99 product.  Usually order 2 cases at a time.   And never seem to get both delivered.  One is always "lost."    Any possibility of banding/taping 2 boxes together for shipping??!!

Review.Titre: took over a month to get here and when…
Review.Contenu: took over a month to get here and when i asked when will my order get here i was told it was a non stock item when i knew it was a stocking item because i bought it many times before !

Review.Titre: Your products and equipment are good…
Review.Contenu: Your products and equipment are good but whomever I spoke with on the phone  twice made sure that I won't ever order from you again.Just trying to get some information about pieces of equipment that hadn't arrived with the shipment I received but was told someone at my place should have checked everything before signing the packaging slip.Who assembles all of their equipment when a driver is waiting,  no one does and when i called i got a friendly lady on the phone but than was transferred to the most unprofessional and rude individual I ever met. I had to buy two items again and I would not recommend this company to anyone and would think twice before buying equipment from them

Review.Titre: I'd rate my experience higher
Review.Contenu: I'd rate my experience higher, but the trigger sprayers were backordered and when the expected arrival time had passed I emailed CleanFreak. That was more than a week ago and I haven't heard back.

Review.Titre: Ordering and delivery was great
Review.Contenu: Ordering and delivery was great, five minutes after we started using it one of the plastic levers on the handle broke, we have left messages with the manufacturer but we haven’t heard anything yet.

Review.Titre: There search engine seems to just go on…
Review.Contenu: There search engine seems to just go on a wild goose chase, I've been in the cleaning business for 30yrs. I know what I'm asking for. And they have most everything if you can find it!

Review.Titre: Not as sturdy as I was expecting and…
Review.Contenu: Not as sturdy as I was expecting and one came in broken. I emailed and didn't hear back so I had to call. Still waiting on a replacement.

Review.Titre: The heater came broken
Review.Contenu: The heater came broken so I am still waiting on a part to be shipped. I hope to change the three star to a five star once I get it working.

Review.Titre: The product for sale wasn't available
Review.Contenu: The product for sale wasn't available, or marked as such. I placed the order only to find this out. The payment was refunded quickly ,which is appreciated.

Review.Titre: The towlets are not very moist
Review.Contenu: The towlets are not very moist. You might be able to do something if you use several towelets to disinfect one thing. You can definitely smell the alcohol.

Review.Titre: Mixed emotions
Review.Contenu: The ordering was great. I got the package relatively quickly, but the part seems like it won’t work. I’m aftaid to give it to my customer

Review.Titre: Good prices and value on name brand…
Review.Contenu: Good prices and value on name brand items.  Long ship times however, with no communication as to why, until I reached out to ask.

Review.Titre: my problem is it took a long time to be…
Review.Contenu: my problem is it took a long time to be delivered to me otherwise it is a good product to use .and they always answer to my emails.

Review.Titre: I ordered the aqua 27in
Review.Contenu: I ordered the aqua 27in Pads and they will leave blue marks on high spots. No other brands have done this to me.

Review.Titre: This machine works good I had a rug…
Review.Contenu: This machine works good I had a rug doctor before this one and I think it picked up a little bit better

Review.Titre: Product not available.
Good Machine
Review.Contenu: Our old machine died and the tech department was helpful, however the machine was not fixable.  Customer service was helpful in getting us a new one.

Review.Titre: Offer is shipped on time and received…
Review.Contenu: Offer is shipped on time and received in good condition, but have not used it yet.

Review.Titre: 2,800 CFM fan NOT 2,800 CFM
Review.Contenu: I ordered a fan that was advertised as doing 2,800 CFM.  When I measured the air flow I got about 1,000 CFM.  I don't think it was their problem.  I think it was the labeling by the fan manufacturer.  Anyway, I contacted them and they agreed to a full refund including shipping. Based on their professionalism and customer orientation, I give them 4 stars.  I would go back to them again.

Review.Titre: Our scrubber came in on time we were… yes it did was the wrong one in fact came a day early
Review.Contenu: Our scrubber came in on time we were all excited, when we open the box our excitement turned in to disappointment when we saw the cord we ordered a battery. We got on the phone with customer services. She looked up the order saw the mistake, was so understanding and apologizing and started the return process. That machine was picked up now we wait for our battery scrubber.

Review.Titre: Great machine, junk accessories
Review.Contenu: So, the machine works great. Great heat, great general functionality. The accessories are a disaster. The cheap pressure hose literally came loose of the fitting in its first ten minutes of use. The wand is equally cheap, essentially the lowest quality wand available and not very functional. So be prepared to shell out another $500 to get a proper hose and usable upholstery tool.The reality is, everybody is going to send you fairly garbage accessories, so I’m still pretty happy with the value and function of the purchase, but it’s good to be aware of what’s coming.

Review.Titre: Hey Guys
Review.Contenu: Hey Guys, Ray here, I wanted to say thank you for your quick response taking care of my purchase and for your professionalism. The machine does as advertised, No complaints, used your product once and have nothing to mention yet. Looking forward to trying more products from Clean Freak in the future. Thanks again and have a good day.

Review.Titre: 2 issues otherwise okay
Review.Contenu: I purchased a solution tank for my rotary floor machine.  The solution delivery mechanism is too tight to deliver the solution and then shut off. This causes all the water in the tank to run out onto the floor. A big problem. I also bought a small extractor which came with a hand tool.  The opening of the hand tool is a series of small holes. These trap hair and fibers in the opening.  I have to disassemble the tool (6 screws) to clean it after each use.  Again, another problem. Any suggestions?

Review.Titre: Little expensive shipping
Review.Contenu: Everything good just shipping sometimes is expensive I bought 2 gallons of extractor care for $$45 dlls but the shipping is almost 30 dlls more almost same value as product :(

Review.Titre: My first experience was great package…
Review.Contenu: My first experience was great package ordered actually arrived ahead of schedule. Everything was just what I thought it would be. I will definitely keep ordering thru you guys. Thanks

Review.Titre: Better than what I expected for…
Review.Contenu: Better than what I expected for stripping floors...I purchased the "Trusted Clean 'Quench' Wet Push Vacuum-18 gal" and was skeptical because there weren't enough pictures when I checked it out online.I honestly don't know what the struggle was when putting it together since another coworker did that for me.The reason why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 was because the instructions weren't that great. The one I found said what to do but what good was that when I didn't know the terms of each part. I just did a quick youtube video on one that was similar, and it was easy after that.I will say it's a little hard to kick up the front squeegee part but it's no big deal. It was very easy to empty. I detached the back hose and ran water in the machine to make sure everything was all cleared out.

Review.Titre: Great Service/Great Products/High Shipping Cost
Review.Contenu: Shipping cost was high in my opinion. Others vendors offer free shipping beyond a certain price point but other than that my experience was great!

Review.Titre: The order took longer than expected
Review.Contenu: The order took longer than expected, however communication on delivery time was excellent. With that said, the wait was worth it. Took 3 years to find a source for the product that I ordered

Review.Titre: I did a lot of research on this unit…
Review.Contenu: I did a lot of research on this unit and found it to be the best price I got. The extra 5% paid for the shipping. I was a little disappointed in the size of the extractors handle. It would be nice if there was a mini to get in the smaller places. I did the carpeting on a GMC terrain and found I couldn't get into the tighter places. The seats worked well.\ Overall I think the unit will be fine.

Review.Titre: Product arrived in good condition
Review.Contenu: Can’t wait to use the buffer, burnisher and wet vac on our floors. We have a school that uses our church and we need these items. They will soon be out for Christmas break and we can give the floors the attention they need. The items arrived in great condition and look great.

Review.Titre: Fast shipping and great customer service.
Review.Contenu: The vacuum we ordered arrived quickly. Unfortunately, it was damaged when it arrived, but the customer service was excellent and we got the new parts we needed to get the vacuum up and running.

Review.Titre: Economical and Expedient
Review.Contenu: Thank you for providing an economical option for purchasing equipment for my small janitorial business. The delivery to my driveway is appreciated especially when you are not charging me extra for delivery!

Review.Titre: Needs weights for dry stripping
Review.Contenu: The machine is quite heavy, it needs weights for dry stripping, it is hard to control when the stripper in on the floor and the solution sprays out the sides onto the wall. I am very happy with the machine though.

Review.Titre: This scrubber was delivered timely and…
Review.Contenu: This scrubber was delivered timely and easy to setup and use. Works great in my farm shop getting the dust off the floor. Cord was not troublesome during use just worked away from the outlet and it was never really in the way

Review.Titre: There was a little confusion on one Of…
Review.Contenu: There was a little confusion on one Of the parts I ordered but we managed to get everything correct and all the parts are now installed and working great for me. Thanks for your help

Review.Titre: Customer service was great to the time…
Review.Contenu: Customer service was great to the time to answer my questions before I made a purchase of their products! Will be doing more business with them in the future!Thank you,Don

Review.Titre: The products were shipped in great…
Review.Contenu: The products were shipped in great timing and were packaged very well for there being so many on a pallet. The pricing was fair. Have yet to use any so can’t rate quality of machine or products at this time.

Review.Titre: COVID Strikes Again - Happy Ending Though!
Review.Contenu: I ordered 3 times from CleanFreak.com for my carpet cleaning business.My first order was placed with items missing when I checked out which would've resulted in me paying extra shipping. Jessica was very helpful and was able to quickly process my refund so I could submit the correct order.My second order was placed correctly, however the vendor was VERY delayed on the manufacture of their machines. This lead to communication issues between the manufacturer and CleanFreak which made it difficult to communicate to me the ETA of the delivery. I ended up having to cancel my order 8 weeks later so I could place an order for an in stock machine.This lead to issues in processing the refund for the items that were not shipped. The refund was processed quickly but incorrectly. Despite this, a quick email to explain I was missing part of the refund, and the remainder was refunded to me.The third order was for a buffer only to hopefully accomplish what the previous two orders should have. I can not say enough how awesome this order went. I ordered the buffer for a good price, paid a little higher on shipping than I wanted, however the shipping was VERY fast and the machine was delivered best freight the next week (roughly 4 business days). Despite the intial trouble, I am so pleased with the final order as I heard this is how its supposed to go from other CleanFreak customers. I am very happy with the service and assistance throughout the entire process, and will order from CleanFreak again when I need to restock my supplies.Big thanks to Jessica and Kathryn for their patience, responsiveness, and excellent assistance through the process.

Review.Titre: The service after the sale made it a…
Review.Contenu: The service after the sale made it a stress free experience.

Review.Titre: Great deals and customer service
Review.Contenu: Great deals and customer service. Products are of the highest quality as well.

Review.Titre: Delivery took 3 weeks from date of…
Review.Contenu: Delivery took 3 weeks from date of purchase. Which seems like a long time

Review.Titre: Great Product
Review.Contenu: Product came as advertised and works great

Review.Titre: I like the product
Review.Contenu: I like the product. If You don’t hear from me that means I’m a happy customer.

Review.Titre: We bought a automatic floor scrubber…
Review.Contenu: We bought a automatic floor scrubber package , after we finally got the unit ordered everything went well, tried it for the first time today it works nice . I wish instructions for set up were better , thanks to YouTube we got it figured out . The only other thing we had to send other info to get tax exempt status . But when we saw the shipping papers tax was still applied . Hoping for many good years of service . Thanks !

Review.Titre: Pleased that i purchased this upright vacuum
Review.Contenu: So far so good. Competent working upright. Works much better than off the shelf vacuums found in department stores. Necessity improvements needed: much longer stretch hose, improved suction at side edges of vacuum head, some type of lighting at front and sides of vacuum head. Pleased that i bought this unit. Lets give it 9 months then elaborate again.

Review.Titre: I have used Clean Freak for over 10…
Review.Contenu: I have used Clean Freak for over 10 years and do like your product and services as well.. however, you keep sending my supplies to my former address even though my current address shows on the original order.. I had to drive to my former home and pick up my supplies again..  I pay to have it delivered to My house ...Thank you Danny Beeler

Review.Titre: The Viper floor scrubber machine was…
Review.Contenu: The Viper floor scrubber machine was easy to use and did a great job cleaning our indoor pickleball courts.  We have concrete base with 9 layers of rubber and 3-4 layers of acrylic paint on top. The vacuum system component did  a great job sucking up the water. Very impressed with the unit. Richard Hollloman 910-352-1658 cell

Review.Titre: The machine was very well packed in a…
Review.Contenu: The machine was very well packed in a wooden crate.  The supplies which came with it suffered along the trip.  Most of them were missing.  The ones which did ship, arrived in damaged boxes.  All were okay except one gallon of cleaner which leaked on all the other boxes.  When calling the CleanFreak number on the BOL, I reached the private cell phone of an employee.  He was a little surprised by how I got his number but was very helpful in getting the remainder of the products to us and replacing the one which was damaged. He took care of it very quickly and remained in contact throughout the process.

Review.Titre: Sent me someone else's order but after…
Review.Contenu: Sent me someone else's order but after a couple days of emails and calls got it taken care of. This was only the second time ordering from them. First time they said item was in stock but then as soon as I pay it's not. They never email when your order ships like they tell you they will so you never know when to expect your order. I got my orders over a month ago and in my account with them they still say preparing so 1 ⭐ for communication. I give them 4 ⭐ over all because they did resolve the receiving The wrong order situation pretty quick at no additional cost or hassle to me.

Review.Titre: Would have given a 5 star had there…
Review.Contenu: Would have given a 5 star had there been more communication during the shipping process. I received the freight quickly at a superior savings and thoroughly enjoyed my dealings with clean freak. However because they are a distribution network or third party they are missing the element of communication to the customer. Overall, I highly recommend

Review.Titre: Door pod and refills, hand soap, & microfiber towels
Review.Contenu: I like the door pod, but the smell hasn’t lasted a month. I haven’t tried the eco friendly smell yet, just the other smell. For my hand soap I ordered some kind of sweet sounding flavor, well the name sounded like it smelled sweet. The name of the hand soap doesn’t match the actual smell of the hand soap. I would have purchased a good smelling hand soap instead, however, the price was a good deal for the quantity.  I like the size and price of the microfiber towels also.

Review.Titre: Great products
Review.Contenu: Great products. Prices are ok, but when you have to pay for shipping and taxes, the price shifts into the higher end a bit. I think you should put more thought into your superstar customers, as opposed to just offering generic coupons/discounts. The free gift is a nice gesture, but I’d rather receive a 25% off my next item, free shipping on all items, or something along those lines for spending thousands dollars with CleanFreak. Again, love the site and products, I don’t love the rewards program.

Review.Titre: Received  product fast
Review.Contenu: Received  product fast, the 24 inch sweeper. It works fine but not the best at getting fine dust picked up. The vibrator that automatically goes off to remove dust from the filter, does it at random and makes a mess on the floor while using, but overall does nice job on bigger debris picking it up.

Review.Titre: This machine is awesome
Review.Contenu: This machine is awesome! very user friendly, gets the job done. The only thing that I would improve on is the method of draining the  reservoir tank. It does not completely empty the dirty water out. When you start up for another cleaning task, you get an odor for the first 10-15 seconds.

Review.Titre: Great Customer Service
Review.Contenu: The order process was easy for the item i wanted, but for some reason FedEx decided to return the product to sender without an explanation.  Once I advised CleanFreak, they went to the vendor and had the item shipped immediately and it was received in good time.  Thank you for your help.

Review.Titre: Overall positive experience
Review.Contenu: Overall positive experience. I would've given 5 stars, however, I deducted a star because I didn't get a confirmation email, or any info on shipping of my order. It seems that's only available if you sign up with the site and didn't check out as a guest.

Review.Titre: It was really successful when I…
Review.Contenu: It was really successful when I discovered this online service. I was very impressed with that, but because of its low quality favours, I'm going to buy from here and never use any service, but if quality goods are available here.

Review.Titre: We ordered a 17" commercial size floor…
Review.Contenu: We ordered a 17" commercial size floor buffer for our home based Cattery business. We used it on our carpet, tile and hardwood floors. I must say, it does an outstanding job. It takes a bit of finesse to control the buffer. But once you have that, it's easy and let it do its job. The only complaint I have of the machine is. When you fill the external tank full of cleaning solution. Changing the buffer pad out is a 2 person job. There is no lid on the tank, therefore, when you lay it down to change the buffer pad. YOU will make a mess. Other than that issue, it's a 5-star product.

Review.Titre: New Receptionist (?)
Review.Contenu: Once I receive product I might upgrade to 5 stars. But the customer service was like trying to peel a mushy avacado! Couldn’t really get a conversation started with the man that answered the phone!  So I’m hoping the product is more lively than he was! JS!

Review.Titre: how satisfied I was with my purchase .
Review.Contenu: the machine I ordered was the right size that I was looking for not too big or to small and seems to be working ok . so far I'm satisfied with my purchased.ordering it was very difficult to do it did not want to except my mailing address the web sight has some issues. also from the time they took my money out of my account it took a very long time to ship my machine and products to me .They also chose a different carrier than the one I chose i chose ups but they shipped it by R&L Carriers .But when my order finally was delivered to me it was package really great and the delivery person was very friendly and new his job well.so I'm very satisfied with my purchase .

Review.Titre: The company was great real quick to…
Review.Contenu: The company was great real quick to process the order and get it delivered. I had to use the chat feature to ask questions and very easy to use and courteous. I am not sure the quality of the product just yet as I started using it

Review.Titre: Delivery
Review.Contenu: Only issue I has was with delivery. Once the driver brought my carpet extractor to my building he wanted to charge me $50 to use his lift gate. My ticket says Freight terms are prepaid so not sure why he wanted another 50.

Review.Titre: Very easy purchase
Review.Contenu: Very easy purchase, great selection, and a rep reached out to me in regards to my purchase. I do wish the machine had an arm to lift the brush in instances where I would just like to use the squeegee portion.

Review.Titre: The item I purchased was supposed to…
Review.Contenu: The item I purchased was supposed to come assembled. I was told that the only thing I would need to attach is the pad driver. Not true at all.  Further, when I notified the company about this via email, they didn't respond. (Update: They did respond after I posted this review). Please note, the above was my original response. Since that time, the company contacted me and explained that this item used to come assembled, but now comes with the handle detached. And for the inconvenience, they offered me a $100 refund or $100 worth of products. Great deal. They also directed me to a video which explains assembly. Additionally, they directed me to the nearest store in order for someone to help with the assembling. They did their part to resolve this issue, and I commend them for that.

Review.Titre: Good so far
Review.Contenu: Good so far. Been using the machine full time for a few weeks and is showing no signs of letting up. Nervous about the quality of plastic used for some of the components but so far, no complaints.

Review.Titre: It went well
Review.Contenu: It went well, no problems

Review.Titre: Taylor was a big help on this last…
Review.Contenu: Taylor was a big help on this last order.  However, Matt came across as a little snarky on the phone.  The products are good and we will continue to use clean freak for our floor care needs.

Review.Titre: You did what I expected I knew your…toilet paper order
Review.Contenu: You did what I expected I knew your shipment was going to take awhile when I ordered it but you kept In touch answered all my questions.  It arrived like you said it would thank you.

Review.Titre: would like a little more detail for a…
Review.Contenu: would like a little more detail for a hyperlink for shipment tracking, also an estimated ship date when you place the order would be more competitive in the online marketplace.

Review.Titre: I was recommended an item from…
Review.Contenu: I was recommended an item from CleanFreak for our commercial bathrooms and ended up purchasing a few different items. The items seem to be working and smell great but there seems to be an issue internally. I originally never received a confirmation order and placed an order on July 29th. I called on August 18th to check on my order since nothing had been shipped or confirmed. I called to check in and they had my order in process and realized half of the order was shipping direct from the manufacturer and some things were out of stock. I finally received half my order about a week after speaking to someone in customer service on the 18th and then finally received the rest of the order on September 2nd. I know this is sort of out of the company's control but I was in limbo for a while without any information. At this time I will continue to purchase products from CleanFreak because they seem like they are working well for what we need.

Review.Titre: They didn't actually stock the item and…
Review.Contenu: They didn't actually stock the item and had to have it shipped from another supplier, so it took a little extra time but the product was just what we needed.

Review.Titre: Nice
Review.Contenu: Service is good

Review.Titre: Frustrated a little
Review.Contenu: No one has contacted me about my square sander and I have been very patient even while losing money cause I dont have my equipment.

Review.Titre: Other than some back ordered bonnets
Review.Contenu: Other than some back ordered bonnets, we have been very, very happy with all things ordered from Clean Freak...great products....great prices!!!!

Review.Titre: Great product

Review.Contenu: Top notch products!  I come back again and again because the results can't be matched with cheaper solutions. Customer service is fast and friendly if they are needed. 5 stars!

Review.Titre: Lucas was great
Review.Contenu: Lucas was great. He answered my numerous questions during my initial call. He was prompt and courteous and placed my order for me on a subsequent call. And even though the Clarke 17” buffer was listed on back order, his assurance that the machine would most likely be available before then was right on target. My machine arrived yesterday. I finally have a machine that can tackle the tough job of paste waxing and buffing my old, unsealed hardwood floors. My experience with Clean Freak—from my initial contact to delivery—was stellar.

Thank you for your Professionalism.

The only down side is if you have to move the trusted clean box extractor up and down stairs bring some one to help.

Review.Titre: Leander ISD Pressure Mower
Review.Contenu: Product works great, the pressure mower does exactly what its suppose to do.   Can cover a lot of surface in very short time.  Having the wand option on the rig itself is a great idea, so that you don't multiple pieces of equipment on the job site.  The only down side was the my pressure mower was damaged in shipping, front wheel was damaged.  Had to make some adjustments so that it could role around with out any issues.  Other than that I am extremely happy with the product that the Clean Freaks build.
